description: This Java source file defines data transfer object (DTO) classes for Note API requests and responses within the notes application backend. It includes classes for creating, updating, and viewing notes, each annotated for API schema documentation and validation.

classes.name: NoteDtos
classes.description: Container class for note-related DTO classes used in API requests and responses.

classes.name: CreateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO representing the request body for creating a new note, including fields for title, content, and optional user ID.

classes.name: UpdateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO representing the request body for updating an existing note, including fields for title and content.

classes.name: NoteResponse
classes.description: DTO representing the response payload for a note, including metadata such as ID, timestamps, and user info.
